thread.title: All Your Questions About Kailyn Lowry’s Third Pregnancy, Answered (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: All Your Questions About Kailyn Lowry’s Third Pregnancy, Answered (PHOTOS)

author: Haley Longman
title: All Your Questions About Kailyn Lowry’s Third Pregnancy, Answered (PHOTOS)
text:
A post shared by Kailyn Lowry (@kaillowry) on Feb 13, 2017 at 4:04pm PST How Far Along Is She? Advertisement 
Farther than you think! Kail revealed she’s about “halfway” through her pregnancy, meaning she’s around 20 weeks pregnant, give or take. When Is She Due? Feb 1, 2017 at 12:06pm PST When Is She Due? Advertisement 
Based on our calculations, this brings Kailyn’s due date to late June or early July. Was the Pregnancy Planned? A post shared by Kailyn Lowry (@kaillowry) on Feb 23, 2017 at 7:24pm PST Was the Pregnancy Planned? Advertisement 
Yup! The soon-to-be mom of three insists "this was a choice I made," but admits it isn't an "ideal situation." Still, she is so happy and can't wait to be a mom again! Why Now? A post shared by Kailyn Lowry (@kaillowry) on Feb 19, 2017 at 9:34am PST Why Now? Advertisement 
Though pregnancy rumors circulated weeks prior to Kail’s big reveal, she shared the news when she did due to undisclosed “health complications” before she got pregnant that she wasn’t ready to share publicly. 
Also, since she suffered a miscarriage in late 2015 , she was extra cautious this time around and didn’t want to announce too early. Do Her Exes Know? Jan 14, 2017 at 6:25pm PST Do Her Exes Know? Advertisement 
Though Kailyn and Javi, Lincoln’s dad, didn’t get to have a conversation about it before the news hit the press, she insists Jo, Isaac’s dad, was one of the first to know. How Does Javi Feel? A post shared by Javi Marroquin (@javim9) on Feb 23, 2017 at 5:41pm PST How Does Javi Feel? Advertisement 
Uh, not so great. Though he hasn’t released an official statement on the matter, her still newly-ex-husband has dropped some hints on his feelings like in the Instagram photo above. Did She Cheat on Javi? A post shared by Kailyn Lowry (@kaillowry) on Jun 5, 2016 at 1:19pm PDT Did She Cheat on Javi? Advertisement 
We’re going to go with no on this one. Though the former couple’s divorce just became official in December, they were legally separated when Kailyn got pregnant in the fall of 2016. What Do Her Co-Stars Think? Congrats @KailLowry I'm so excited for you!!! — Chelsea DeBoer (@ChelseaHouska) February 24, 2017 What Do Her Co-Stars Think? Advertisement 
Chelsea Houska and Jenelle Evans seem happy for her! Both TM2 gals sent Kail congratulatory tweets when the news hit. Who Is the Baby Daddy? A post shared by Kailyn Lowry (@kaillowry) on May 7, 2016 at 2:42pm PDT Who Is the Baby Daddy? Advertisement 
Ah, the million dollar question! Kail has confirmed the father is not JC Cuevas, her MTV producer, nor is it Tyler Hill, an old friend from school with whom she seemed to be flirty at one point. 
The latest rumor is the dad is the mystery guy with whom she was caught on Teen Mom 2 , or… Who Is Terry Jones? A post shared by Terry Jones (@tjonesss_fitaf) on Feb 2, 2017 at 5:27pm PST Who Is Terry Jones? Advertisement 
...the dad could be this looker of a dude, Terry Jones, if some fans are to be believed. 
He's a personal trainer who’s working with Kailyn on a fitness project. Will She Finish School? A post shared by Kailyn Lowry (@kaillowry) on Oct 15, 2016 at 10:28am PDT Will She Finish School? Advertisement 
Yes! Kail is just a few credits shy of her Bachelor’s degree from Delaware State University , and said on her blog she will still “continue to focus on school with my graduation in May.” Will She Still Go on the 'Teen Mom' Cruise? A post shared by Maci Bookout McKinney (@macideshanebookout) on Nov 15, 2016 at 12:41pm PST Will She Still Go on the 'Teen Mom' Cruise? Advertisement 
Probably not. Kailyn, as well as OGs Maci and Amber, signed on to go on a Teen Mom cruise in the Bahamas in late July, but it’s likely she’ll back out since her baby is due around the same time. Is It a Boy or a Girl? A post shared by Kailyn Lowry (@kaillowry) on Feb 5, 2017 at 10:43am PST Is It a Boy or a Girl? Advertisement 
We don’t know and neither does Kail. Like with her first two kids, she’s going to wait until the birth to find out the sex.
